turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Sensitivity to light and nausea can sometimes be associated with headaches. Based on your description, it's possible you're experiencing tension headaches or migraines. If the pain persists or worsens, consult with a medical professional.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While it's understandable to be concerned, headaches are rarely the sole symptom of a brain tumor.
